--- In gladiator@y..., laughingmadman@h... wrote:
> i just went to look at all the levels in the files section of here, 
> and most of the Zip files are empty, what gives?

Hmmm.  I know I packed my scenarios inside the Zip file.  To access 
Telvido's scenarios, you have to unzip once and then unzip the 
internal zipped file.

Accessing scenarios - 1st, make sure that they are in the samefolder 
as gladiator is in.  2nd, make sure that you saved the file name 
correctly, and 3rd, type in the correct scenario # at the set level 
spot.
